description: Single storey side/rear extension; single storey front extension; conversion of a garage into a habitable room including associated external alteration involving the insertion of a window in lieu of the garage door opening; single storey front porch extension involving construction of a canopy
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

Application form; Location plan; Site Plan; Ground floor (Drawing number: A101+A201); First floor (Drawing number: A102+A202); Roof Plan (Drawing number: A104+A204); Section (Drawing number: A105+A205); Front elevation (Drawing number: A106+A206); Rear elevation (Drawing number: A107+A207); West elevation (Drawing number: A108+A208); East elevation (Drawing number: A109+A209); Site Photos (Drawing number: A110)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), polices D1, and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
